item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, September 11, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple must pay €13bn in back taxes, top EU court rules
2. Harris vs Trump: Five things to watch for in the presidential debate
3. Sweden says rooting out gangs will take a decade
4. Fed halves proposed capital requirement rise for largest US banks
5. [Opinion] Britain is building a new sovereign wealth fund — what can it learn from the others?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, September 11, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
